name: Harold VS the RPG
description:
What happens in an RPG if neither the heroes, narrator, and artists want to be there? The result is Harold VS the RPG. Play a very short Visual Novel game where Harold and Valerie don't really want to be there, and neither does the narrator. 

Along the way you will encounter:

-Sample maps! As the mapping team is on strike.

-Harold at 20x normal size. Because why not?

-An epic plot between good and evil and (ed: How did you write that with a straight face?)

In all seriousness, the game is 5 - 10 minutes long. It is done Visual Novel style but in RPGMaker. I hope you enjoy it. Or at least get a laugh out of it.
